title: Swiffer Sweeper Compatible, Microfiber Mop Pads by Easily Greener, Reusable Refills for Wet and Dry Use, 2 Count
features: 2 machine washable pads replace hundreds of disposable refills for your Swiffer Sweeper
Exclusive loose strand microfiber surface glides on floors, picks up dirt, pet hair and debris, and rinses clean easier than standard looped microfiber
Perfectly safe for all floor types, hardwood, tile, laminate, linoleum, bamboo, stone, marble, and more
Works both wet and dry, for either sweeping or mopping
Folded edges clean all the way up against baseboards, corners and furniture
description: (2) 11.75" x 6.25" microfiber mop pads by Easily Greener, designed to fit the Swiffer Sweeper. Reusable pad design consists of specially designed microfiber fabric with scrubbing strips, and hook-and-loop flaps. 100% Polyester.
This product is not endorsed by or affiliated with Swiffer or The Procter & Gamble Company. Swiffer and Swiffer Sweeper are registered trademarks of The Procter & Gamble Company.
